<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/collections/{collectionId}/schema"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get schema for a single Bohr OGC API feature collection

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"collectionId","in":"path","description":"A known collection ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"my-collection"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
